item.title: JSF Primefaces DataTable Example
item.description: A detailed step-by-step tutorial on how to implement a PrimeFaces DataTable using Spring Data JPA, Spring Boot, and Maven.

item.title: JSF Primefaces Spring Security Example
item.description: A detailed step-by-step tutorial on how to implement a PrimeFaces login page using Spring Security, Spring Boot, and Maven.

item.title: JSF Primefaces Themes Example
item.description: A code sample on how to configure the PrimeFaces Bootstrap theme using Spring Boot.

item.title: JSF PrimeFaces Welcome Page Redirect Example
item.description: A code sample on how to implement a PrimeFaces for JSF welcome page redirect using Spring Boot.

item.title: JSF Primefaces Automated Unit Testing using Selenium
item.description: A detailed step-by-step tutorial on how to implement an automated unit test for PrimeFaces using Selenium.

item.title: JSF PrimeFaces Example
item.description: A detailed step-by-step tutorial on how to implement a Hello World PrimeFaces for JSF example using Spring Boot and Maven.

item.title: JSF - PrimeFaces Hello World Example using WebSphere Application Server and Maven
item.description: A detailed step-by-step tutorial in which we build and run a Hello World PrimeFaces example using WebSphere Application Server and Maven.

item.title: JSF - PrimeFaces Hello World Example using Apache Tomcat and Maven
item.description: A detailed step-by-step tutorial in which we build and run a Hello World PrimeFaces example using Apache Tomcat and Maven.

item.description: A detailed step-by-step tutorial in which we build and run a Hello World PrimeFaces example using WildFly and Maven

item.title: JSF - Login Servlet Filter Example
item.description: A detailed step-by-step tutorial on how to implement a JSF login servlet filter example using PrimeFaces, Spring Boot, and Maven.

item.title: JSF - PrimeFaces Hello World Example using Jetty and Maven
item.description: A detailed step-by-step tutorial in which we build and run a Hello World PrimeFaces example using Jetty and Maven.
